titleStmt.title: Rubbe, and a great cast Epigrams. By Thomas Freeman, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Freeman, Thomas, b. 1590 or 91.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Nicholas Okes], and are to bee sold [by L. Lisle] at the Tigers Head,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and bookseller's names from STC.
"Runne, and a great cast" has separate divisional title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
